toJSON

org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONObject toJSON(Command cmd,
                                                Result result,
                                                org.apache.sling.api.resource.ValueMap config)
                                                throws org.apache.sling.commons.json.JSONException
Turns the Result combination into a JSON object by way of ResultSerializers.

Parameters:
cmd - the Command
result - the Result
config - configuration used by ResultSerializer implementations
Returns:
the JSON representation of the result
